skins.shipDescription: Mogami-class heavy cruiser number two ¨C Mikuma.
skins.selfIntroduction: I am Mikuma, the second ship of the Mogami-class. I collided with my sister in Midway, but I don't resent her for it. On the contrary: she... Ah, forgive me for changing the topic so suddenly... I shall do everything I can for the fleet, so please give me your orders.
skins.acquisition: My name is Mikuma. I'm Mogami's little sister. If... if you don't mind, could you please look after her? She has a bit of an unusual personality, you see...
skins.login: Welcome back. Let's try to get a lot of work done today.
skins.details: My... horn? If it makes people remember me, then I believe it's not all that bad.
skins.secretaryIdle1: My sister is... probably sitting somewhere, alone, lamenting the past again. Commander, would you please excuse me for a moment?
skins.secretaryIdle2: A secretary should be the Commander's right hand. Please don't hesitate to give me orders.
skins.secretaryIdle3: I was the first heavy cruiser to sink in the war... Oh, never mind, it was nothing important.
skins.secretaryTouch: I'm standing by. Please give me your orders.
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: ... Commander, please be wary of accidental discharges from my cannons.
